acupoint.standard_location: 在足底部，卷足时足前部凹陷处，约当足底第2、3跖趾缝纹头端与足跟连线的前1/3与后2/3交点上
acupoint.standard_location_en: On the sole, in the depression when the foot is in plantar flexion, at the junction of the anterior 1/3 and posterior 2/3 of the line connecting the base of the 2nd and 3rd toes and the heel
acupoint.simple_method: 脚掌前部凹陷处，脚趾弯曲时出现的人字形纹路交点
acupoint.simple_method_en: Curl your toes. The point is in the depression that forms on the sole, at the crease shaped like an inverted V.
acupoint.anatomical: 有趾短屈肌，趾长屈肌腱，第二蚓状肌；有足底动脉弓，足底内侧动脉；布有足底内侧神经支
functions: 滋阴降火 (nourish yin, reduce fire)
开窍宁神 (open orifices, calm spirit)
回阳救逆 (restore yang, rescue from collapse)
